title: The five new shoe and boot trends to try now
text:
Surveying my shoe shelves over the weekend, it occurred to me that I can remember the specific seasons and circumstances behind the acquisition of most of my footwear. There are the biker boots that were the only shoes that fit by the end of my twin pregnancy in 2013 (I haven’t worn them since); the gold Gucci heeled loafers, bought as a new-job gift-to-self in summer 2016 and still going strong; the party-ready black satin mules I bought in a fit of excitement before the 2017 holiday party season and never managed to wear.

Forget carbon-dating - in fashion, it’s shoes (and handbags) that date an outfit. That’s why new shoes can be such a dependable shortcut to guaranteeing your wardrobe looks...
description: Surveying my shoe shelves over the weekend, it occurred to me that I can remember the specific seasons and circumstances behind the acquisition of most of my footwear.
